title: Find Location of a City-Owned Asset
description: A public works employee needs to find the exact location of a specific piece of equipment (e.g., a mobile generator) for deployment.

tasks.description: Receive a request for the location of 'Generator #12'.
Query the asset management system for the specified asset ID.
Retrieve the asset's last reported GPS location from its attached IoT tracker.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system displays the generator's current location on a map.
